attributes.action: referendum on returning all devolved powers to Westminster
attributes.additional_details: the voters will decide at the ballot box
attributes.background: the referendum question should be should all devolved powers be returned to Westminster

rejection.details:
We understand you would like devolved powers to be returned to the UK Parliament. However we’re not sure which of devolved nation or region this referendum would apply to. 

You might like to sign one of these petitions:

‘Hold a referendum on the continuation of devolution in Scotland’: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606015

‘Hold a referendum in Wales on returning devolved powers to the UK Government’: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/604096

‘Hold a referendum in Greater Manchester on removing the position of Mayor’: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606899
